Plot: In mid-1800s England, Oscar is a young Anglican priest, a misfit and an outcast, but with the soul of an angel. As a boy, even though from a strict Pentecostal family, he felt God told him ...
Title: Oscar and Lucinda
Actors: Ralph Fiennes, Cate Blanchett, Ciarán Hinds, Tom Wilkinson
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 7 nominations.
